issue.title: [Website] Remove the link to slack channel
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-2906](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2906). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
[Slack Channel](https://apachearrowslackin.herokuapp.com) has been closed.

See followings:
- http://mail-archives.apache.org/mod_mbox/arrow-dev/201807.mbox/%3CCAJPUwMCDu_yvZE_iA9WCJC%2BVe45m06cmj-BuwqQ9docgD%3DD7Ww%40mail.gmail.com%3E
